item.title: Configuring nodejs and npm behind a proxy
item.description: For people who work in a company and squeez out some of their time to learn nodejs, setting up an dev-environment can be a real pain. Proxy servers are pretty common in college and business type institutions. You can locate your proxy settings from your browser’s settings panel. Using Proxy with NPM Once you have obtained the proxy settings (server URL, port, username and password); you need to configure your npm configurations as follows.
